channel.title: [525] How do I make myself an Admin? [525]
channel.description:
How do I make myself an Admin on my 525 server? I was givin my files by my buddy, and he never made anything admin on it. Please reply, Thanks!
Owner of Fallen Ones V2

item.title: [525] How do I make myself an Admin? [525]
item.dc:creator: @fuckedup111 fuckedup111
item.description:
@fuckedup111 wrote:

Theres no Login.class in a 525,
Try editing your char file.
Search for “rights” and edit the “0” to “2”.

Read full topic

if (p.username.equals("

it would come out like this

            if (p.username.equals("NAME")) {

change name to ur username and DO NOT USE CAPITAL LETTERS!

item.title: [525] How do I make myself an Admin? [525]
item.dc:creator: @Xaros Xaros
item.description:
@Xaros wrote:

Try editing login.class
But 1st refer to the source you are useing and the pictures u saw.
The admin on those pics is ur target.
Click CTRL+F and write His username.
Once u found it edit it to ur username.
DO NOT USE CAPS!
